components.description: A yellow taxicab, iconically seen in New York City. Shown from the front, as opposed to the taxi emoji which displays the side of the vehicle.
components.title: Oncoming Taxi

description: A yellow taxicab, iconically seen in New York City. Shown from the front, as opposed to the taxi emoji which displays the side of the vehicle.
title: Oncoming Taxi

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.name: oncoming taxi

bn:00088912v: Change location; move, travel, or proceed, also metaphorically
To change (from one value to another).
To move or travel (from one location to another).
To change the location of an object.
To transfer a file from one location to another. After the file is transferred, there is only one copy of the file, in the new location.
To move an object one pixel at a time.

bn:00014407n: A person who drives a taxi.
A car driven by a person whose job is to take passengers where they want to go in exchange for money
A taxicab, also known as a taxi or a cab, is a type of vehicle for hire with a driver, used by a single passenger or small group of passengers, often for a non-shared ride.
A vehicle that may be hired for single journeys by members of the public and driven by a taxi driver.
A type of vehicle for hire with a driver
Type of vehicle for hire with a driver
A vehicle that may be hired for single journeys by members of the public, driven by a taxi driver.

bn:00007309n: A motor vehicle with four wheels; usually propelled by an internal combustion engine
A car is a wheeled, self-powered motor vehicle used for transportation.

A type of vehicle designed to move on the ground under its own stored power and intended to carry a driver, a small number of additional passengers, and a very limited amount of other load. A car or motorcar.
A four-wheeled motor vehicle used for land transport.
Automobile, a vehicle steered by a driver.
A wheeled vehicle, drawn by a horse or other animal.
Wheeled motor vehicle used for transporting passengers

bn:00079675n: A conveyance; a device for carrying or transporting substances, objects or individuals.
A vehicle that travels primarily on land in contact with the surface.
A vehicle is a mobile machine that transports passengers or cargo.
Any conveyance in or by which people or objects are transported.
A conveyance that transports people or objects
Mobile machine that can transport people and cargo

apple_vendor_description: Apple's oncoming taxi emoji presents a vibrant yellow cab, captured mid-motion with a dynamic sense of speed and direction, typical of Apple's 3D rendering.  Its smooth, rounded edges and bright, reflective surfaces give it a friendly yet urgent feel, symbolizing transportation, quick arrivals, or a need for a ride in urban settings as seen on Apple devices.
